snippet: Google has made a Wi-Fi router that aims to provide better Internet connections making it easier for people to use its services and see more of its online ads.
abstract: Google introduces OnHub, Wi-Fi router that aims to provide better Internet connections, making it easier for people to use its services and see more of its online ads.
lead_paragraph: Google has made a Wi-Fi router that aims to provide better Internet connections making it easier for people to use its services and see more of its online ads.

headline.main: Google Introduces Router With Ease-of-Use Features
headline.print_headline: Google Introduces Router With Ease-of-Use Features
